attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call an election immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the current climate regarding the expenses scandal, the people no longer have any faith in the political process. This calls upon the prime minister to immediately dissolve parliament and call a new election to allow us, the electorate, to pass judgement on all politicians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
